meanings.definition: To make longer or greater in extent.
meanings.sent1: She lengthened her hair by using extensions.
meanings.sent2: The road lengthened as we drove further into the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The teacher lengthened the math test to challenge the students.
meanings.sent4: His patience lengthened like a rubber band, stretching thin.
meanings.sent5: The shadows lengthened as the sun began to set, casting long silhouettes.

meanings.definition: To extend in time or duration.
meanings.sent1: The meeting lengthened due to the heated discussion.
meanings.sent2: The movie lengthened when additional scenes were added.
meanings.sent3: The delay lengthened our wait at the airport, but we made the best of it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lengthened the moment, making it feel timeless.
meanings.sent5: The excitement lengthened as the countdown to the event continued.
